2100340.name: Liminalia
2100340.description:
Unravel the mysteries of these forgotten lands in a hand-drawn, narrative-driven 2d action-adventure, as a white-robed girl awakens in the depths of an abandoned world.

  • A narrative-driven, single-player action-adventure game.

  • Hand-drawn artwork in watercolor style.

  • Play as a white-robed girl with mystical abilities trying to find her way out of the forsaken realm.

  • Evolve with new skills and abilities to progress to new areas and defeat difficult enemies in 2d side-scrolling action combat.

  • Uncover the mysteries of this abandoned world and the lore behind its downfall through exploration.

How does a world so grand and majestic manage to fall, with only ruins and broken walls to remind us of its past glory.

How do two inseparable souls manage to drift so far apart until a rift shatters their bond.

It happens not with a crash but ever so gently— like the night falling across the sky in its twilight.

One small mistake, one small misjudgment, one small misunderstanding. Little by little until that dreaded day comes when all is too late— and there is no turning back.
